title: Ember DOM Ready
summary: Ember is awesome, in my biased opinion, but it presents interesting new challenges for developers. One of the most common patterns used in web development is to handle a DOM ready event but relying on that in a one-page application isn't possible.

title: Viking Base
summary: Viking Base is an opinionated package intended to provide a solid starting point for building web applications. The package consists of several key components: Ember.js, Handlebars.js, Foundation and gulp. Viking Base leans on Bower to manage dependencies and gulp to build while providing a simple scaffolding script.
